headline: American Tower Corporation Declares Quarterly Distribution
summary: BOSTON, December 05, 2024--American Tower Corporation (NYSE: AMT) announced that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash distribution of $1.62 per share on shares of the Company’s common stock. The distribution is payable on February 3, 2025 to the stockholders of record at the close of business on December 27, 2024.
